description:
PADManager is an advanced [PAD 3.x](http://repository.appvisor.com/padspec/files/padspec311to40-diff.htm) editing and managing application.

Portable Application Description or PAD is a standard developed by the Association of Shareware Professionals ([ASP](http://asp-shareware.com/)). It is designed to replace the old non-formal, plain text [file_id.diz](https://wikipedia.org/wiki/FILE_ID.DIZ) and other textual program descriptions with an XML-based and strictly specified format.

#### Features
* Built-in PAD validator and optimizer that helps you to maximize the results from your promotion campaign
* Visual management of company and product profiles
* Allows your co-workers to share the same profile database over the network
* Installs by default and automatically updates some useful PAD extensions (RSS Feed Aggregators, Site Directories, Affiliate Sites and others)
* Built-in FTP Uploader
* Compatible on the data level with popular submission applications and services
summary: Portable Application Description (PAD) validator and optimizer
author: Mykola Rudenko, Dmitry Silchenko
